snippet.title: Korean

Languages
The BBC Languages site has information on Korean words, phrases, characters and script, plus language facts, tongue twisters and jokes

snippet.title: Italian silence justified?
snippet.description:
Sports Talk / 19 June 2002
ONE, and it looked like they didn't want to score another one. Vieri was right in front of the goal one-on-one with the Korean goal keeper.
